snippet: Many voters often sit out the national elections that take place between presidential races. We want to know: Do you plan to vote in this year’s midterm election? If so, what issues are important to you and why? If you don’t plan to vote, why...
abstract: Many voters often sit out the national elections that take place between presidential races. We want to know: Do you plan to vote in this year’s midterm election? If so, what issues are important to you and why? If you don’t plan to vote, why not?

headline.main: What Makes You Vote, or Not Vote, in This Midterm?
